page.title: 06SHOPPING FOR FOOD CONTINUED
page.content: Nearly half the food he stocks is{Asian.} He thinks customers prefer to buy this from him, rather than at the supermarket, because he can explain how it should be prepared. The owner collects most stock himself but some Asian food is delivered fron London where he can get a greater variety. Comparing the shops, it was found that the supermarket stocks about twice as many brands and varieties, in greater quantities, than the small shop. The supermarket stayed open until 8.00 pm on two evenings, against six evenings at the small shop. Both surveys showed that customers were regular though they shopped for food elsewhere as well. Between 2.00 pm and 2.40 pm on a Monday afternnon, 125 customers entered the supermarket against 16 entering the small shop.
